title: User Experience Manager
description:
Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in eHealth with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our eHealth solutions support healthcare professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.
  
The position This is a unique opportunity to shape the future of UX within our R&D organization, leading the R&D UX team to drive design decisions that benefits thousands of users within the healthcare sector.
  
In this role, you will play a key part in defining UX best practices, ways of working, ensuring design consistency across R&D products, with a superior user experience. As a leader, you will mentor, plan, and lead our UX team while fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
  
  

The role will be a mix of being a manager with line responsibility for UX members in R&D Linköping and Stockholm and working hands-on with UX design together with the team.
  
Leadership at Cambio builds on trust, openness, and safety. It is important for us to treat everyone with dignity, respect, and fairness. We use failures as learning opportunities and a way to stimulate development.
  
  

Our leaders must always “walk the talk” and lead by example. About you The ideal candidate will possess a strong user-experience background, great leadership skills, and the ability to communicate effectively with a diverse range of stakeholders. You are a leader who encourages new ways of thinking and working to drive progress and improvements. Your results-oriented mindset ensures that you consistently focus on delivering value in everything you do. Adaptable, resilient and you thrive in dynamic environments. You excel in collaboration, building strong relationships across the organization to achieve common goals.
  
  

Requirements
  
5+ years of experience in Software development roles including experience in UX design for software development and knowledge of various UX methods and tools.
  
Great leadership and team management skills
  
Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment
  
Bachelor’s degree in Cognitive science, Computer Science, Information Technology, Graphical/interaction design, or a related field (master's degree preferred).
  
  

**Place of employment:** Linköping or Stockholm
  
At Cambio we value a healthy work-life balance, and to encourage that we apply a hybrid working-model. Together with your team you decide which days you work at the office. On the remaining days you can work remotely from home, but you are always more than welcome to work at the office too.
  
**Scope:** Full time
  
**Form of employment:** Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
  
**Other:** We screen the applications and hold interviews continuously so please send your application as soon as possible via the link.
  
We encourage and eagerly welcome all applications, but we will only consider candidates who are located andhave the legal right to work inSweden.We will ask for verification during the process.
  
We look forward to receiving your application!
  
Read more about ushere!
  
Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at the career site here!

title: Senior UX Designer - Engage Studios
description:
**ABOUT ENGAGE STUDIOS**


We design, innovate and build digital / physical products for the world's largest - and Sweden's smallest company. Our guiding principle is to make a difference - for the better. Ideas are good and execution is the success factor. We are people and teams who are not afraid to question, roll up our sleeves and laugh all the way to the finish line.


Since the start in 2009, we have worked with basically all manufacturing / developing companies in Sweden. The Volvo companies, IKEA, H&M, Electrolux, Lynk&Co, Zeekr, Houdini to name a few. Our customers are in the traditional Swedish industry all the way to innovative startups in Silicon Valley. They are not found in oil drilling or the military industry. We are determined to make our presence and work known with passionate and dedicated employees who love design, tech and people.

 **WE OFFER**


At Engage Studios, you will work in many different industries for different customers. You will work with incredibly smart and dedicated colleagues. Together we develop products and services that you can brag about to your friends. We at Engage Studios are always at the forefront of technology development. We develop and share knowledge with each other to get better tomorrow. With us, you get the opportunity to realize your dreams, big and small.

 **JOB DESCRIPTION**


We are looking for a Senior UX Designer to join our Web UX team. In this role, you will be the go-to expert on user needs and pain points, translating insights into intuitive and elegant design solutions. You will own the end-to-end user experience, creating impactful design artifacts including usability tests, user flows, wireframes, and prototypes that seamlessly blend aesthetics with functionality. If you are passionate about delivering exceptional digital experiences and thrive in both the discovery and delivery phases, we would love to hear from you.

 **REQUIREMENTS**


You should have:

* 6+ years experience of consumer-focused companies

### 

**YOUR PROFILE**


You are a versatile designer with a strong foundation in product design, interaction design, and visual design, ensuring every experience feels intuitive and engaging. With excellent communication skills, you inspire teams to take action and foster a deep sense of empathy for the user. Collaboration comes naturally to you, allowing you to work seamlessly with stakeholders across design, marketing, and engineering. Your design approach is always people-focused, continuously refining your instincts through user feedback, whether gathered from hands-on research or data-driven A/B testing.

  

 If you are passionate about UX Design, we want to hear from you. Please apply with your **resume and portfolio**, highlighting your relevant experience and qualifications.

 **MERITS**

* International experience
* Visually communicative
* Tons of Passion
  
* 

  

**PLACE OF EMPLOYMENT**

Gothenburg

 **OTHER**


For questions regarding this position please contact hiring manager Susanne Lidén on susanne@engagestudios.net. Applications must be submitted through the official Career site.

title: Digital Strategist
description:
**Would you like to play a key role in shaping the future of our digital marketing and communications efforts? We're seeking a strategic, hands-on professional who combines technical expertise with excellent business knowledge, contributing to WirelessCar´s growth journey.**

 **WirelessCar’s Journey**


At WirelessCar, we empower future mobility by enabling automakers to harness the full potential of connected vehicles. By developing and operating cutting-edge digital services, we help leading automotive brands drive innovation, enhance mobility, and accelerate their digital transformation. Join our ride and get in the driver’s seat to realize this together with customers like Volkswagen, Volvo, and Jaguar Land Rover!

 **We are looking for Digital Strategist**

In this role, you will lead, manage, and optimize our digital communication strategies across multiple platforms, making a significant impact on our business success. You’ll use data-driven insights and work closely with teams and external partners to drive innovation, enhance user engagement, and improve performance.


With your forward-thinking mindset, you’ll help strengthen and shape our digital presence and contribute to our business growth. This position provides opportunities for autonomy and responsibility, allowing you to play a key role in shaping the future of our digital marketing and communications.  



**Your responsibilities include**

* Lead and manage all digital communication platforms, aligning them with business goals, user engagement, and performance optimization.
* Own WirelessCar’s websites and CMS, handling technical development, UX, performance, and integrations.
* Drive social media and CRM marketing automation, using insights to guide content and engagement.
* Analyze data from GA4, CRM, and other platforms, define KPIs, and provide insights to drive decision-making.
* Optimize internal digital communication and tailor approaches for different audiences.

Collaborate with external agencies and internal teams to improve content, functionality, campaigns, and customer journeys.  
* 

**To join our journey**


WirelessCar is always on the move, often into uncharted land. We are curious, believe in collaboration and are always open to new ideas on how we can make a difference. When you join our journey, you will be part of a great crew of highly competent and warm-hearted people from all over the world.  



**About the Marketing & Communications (MarCom) team at WirelessCar**


The Marketing & Communications team is a global, creative group responsible for all aspects of communication, branding, culture and marketing. We value collaboration, creativity, and results, working across four global sites in a hybrid model. As a team, we establish strategies, structures, and KPIs based on a shared MarCom roadmap. Each person in the team is entrusted with responsibility and autonomy over their area, while collaborating closely to support one another.

 **We believe you bring**


We are looking for a data- and insight-driven professional with a strategic mindset and hands-on approach. You bring proven experience in digital marketing in a B2B environment, along with a solid understanding of website management, SEO, and digital integrations.

  

You excel at leading and supporting others toward shared goals while taking ownership in your area of expertise. Your strong project management and communication skills enable you to balance multiple initiatives and foster successful collaboration across teams in a dynamic environment.

 ***Additional qualifications***

* Ability to analyse digital data and translate it into actionable insights that drive business growth and optimizes digital communication.
* Hands-on experience with CMS platforms and digital marketing technologies.
* Relevant education in marketing, communication, IT, digital strategy, or similar.
* Fluent in English, with advanced skills in both speaking and writing.

Knowledge or interest in digital graphical design and UX/UI principles is a plus.  
* 

**We offer you**

* High-tech company that offers an exciting working environment
* Flat organizational culture founded on trust and autonomy; at WirelessCar, you are not just a number.
* Generous health & well-being packages with regular health checks, possibility to lease a bike, and breakfast every week.
* Tech fund where you pick your choice of tech tools.
* Work-life balance and free access to the gym at the Gothenburg office.
* Flexible working hours and a hybrid workplace.

  

**Way of working**


At WirelessCar we believe in a Hybrid Remote work setup. This position is based in central Gothenburg, with the team working in the office 3-4 days a week.

 **Application Information**


Can you lead, innovate, and make a real impact on WirelessCar’s digital presence? If this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you! -***Last day of application is:*** ***2025-03-18.***  

We recommend applying early to ensure your consideration for the role.

* *A cover letter is not required. Instead, you'll answer a few questions to help us better understand your experience and ambitions.*

 ***Before you apply:***

* *Applicants must have a valid Swedish work permit.*
* *Our company language is English so we kindly ask that you submit your application in English.*

title: Digital Designer
description:
#### **Background**


We are looking for a talented Digital Designer with a strong background in UX, site design, and graphic design to join our growing team. If you excel at crafting innovative, user-centric digital experiences, thrive in e-commerce, and have a passion for designing for a global luxury audience, this role is an exciting opportunity to make an impact.

#### **About the Role**


As a Digital Designer, you will be a key player in defining and executing Nordic Knots’ digital strategy. Reporting directly to the Chief Growth Officer and collaborating closely with our CEO and Co-Founder, you’ll be responsible for elevating our online presence, ensuring our platforms combine visual excellence with outstanding user experience to drive engagement and sales.


Your expertise will span from crafting seamless user journeys and e-commerce experiences to creating high-impact visual content for marketing campaigns. You will lead digital initiatives, work cross-functionally with teams across the company, and take ownership of delivering results in a fast-paced, ambitious environment.

#### **Key Responsibilities**

##### **User Experience (UX):**

* Lead the design and optimisation of user journeys across our e-commerce platforms to ensure a best-in-class digital shopping experience.
* Conduct usability research and testing to identify areas for improvement and implement solutions.
* Develop wireframes, prototypes, and user flows to support site updates and campaigns.

##### **Site Design & Visual Merchandising:**

* Develop and maintain the look and feel of our website, ensuring it aligns with the Nordic Knots brand identity.
* Design and implement layouts, landing pages, and category pages optimised for engagement, sales, and user experience.
* Collaborate with the e-commerce team to ensure the digital storefront reflects trends, seasonal priorities, and customer insights.

##### **Graphic Design:**

* Produce visually striking assets for social advertisements, banners, email campaigns, and digital marketing initiatives.
* Provide art direction and oversight to ensure a cohesive visual language across all platforms and campaigns.
* Elevate the creative impact of the brand’s digital presence through innovative design concepts and storytelling.

##### **Collaboration:**

* Work closely with the e-commerce, marketing, and product teams to execute campaigns, product launches, and seasonal promotions.
* Partner with the content and social media teams to ensure unified messaging and visuals across all channels.
* Collaborate with external creative partners and vendors when required.

##### **Performance Analysis:**

* Use analytics tools (Google Analytics, Microsoft Clarity, or similar) to evaluate site performance and optimize designs based on data-driven insights.
* Stay ahead of industry trends in e-commerce, UX, and graphic design to implement innovative approaches that enhance user engagement.

#### **About You:**


We’re looking for someone who is passionate about design, highly creative, and strategic in their approach. You’ll thrive in this role if you:

#### **Experience & Skills:**

* 3+ years of experience in UX, site design, and graphic design, preferably in e-commerce or luxury retail.
* Proven ability to design and implement user-centric digital experiences that drive engagement and sales.
* Expertise in design tools like Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, XD, After Effects), Figma, or Sketch.
* Strong understanding of e-commerce platforms (Centra or Shopify experience is a plus).
* Familiarity with iterative design processes and A/B testing methodologies.
* Proficiency with analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Hotjar, or Microsoft Clarity) to inform design strategies.
* Experience in art direction for digital campaigns, with a strong portfolio showcasing impactful, results-driven work.

#### **About us**


Nordic Knots is a Scandinavian Textile house founded in 2016 by Liza Berglund Laserow, Fabian Berglund and Felix Berglund. We are a fast-growing direct-to-consumer interior brand that was born from a culture of thoughtful design that lasts beyond seasons and trends. Fusing function and aesthetics with a Scandinavian sensibility, we craft timeless textiles for the modern home. We believe that great textiles are foundational and can transform a house into a harmonious home – framing the most beautifully curated lives.


Nordic Knots headquarters are located in Stockholm with growing teams in both Stockholm and New York.

#### **What we offer**


We are a fun and driven team with high ambitions. We have an entrepreneurial and open-minded culture where all new ideas and suggestions for improvements are valued and encouraged. At Nordic Knots everyone should feel that they are a part of and contributing towards our success as we continue to scale up the brand with many exciting projects on the horizon.

  

At Nordic Knots we stand for a diverse and inclusive workforce. We seek talented individuals who bring a range of perspectives and inspired ideas. We welcome all applicants eager to join a dynamic team.#### **Location**


We are looking for a candidate located in Stockholm.

title: Produktdesigner till framtidens skolplattform - Meitner
description:
### **Om jobbet**


På vägen till att bli Sveriges bästa skolplattform, bygger vi ett team bestående av experter på skola, vassa utvecklare och produkttalanger. Vi har i uppdrag att effektivisera tiden som spenderas på administration och faktisk användning av skolplattformen för att hjälpa elever nå sin fulla potential. Vi letar efter ödmjuka och ambitiösa människor som vill vara med och revolutionera skolan på alla nivåer.

### **Om rollen**


Du kommer att vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som alla har ett gemensamt mål; att bygga den bästa produkten för de människor som utbildar våra framtida generationer. Du kommer vara en del av vårt produkt- och designteam. Vi arbetar iterativt med mentaliteten att allt går att förbättra.

### **Arbetsbeskrivning**

* Designa intuitiva och tillgängliga upplevelser för vår SaaS-plattform.
* Bygga och underhålla designsystem, komponenter, design tokens och variabler i Figma.
* Samarbeta med produkt- och utvecklingsteam för att implementera och förbättra UI/UX-lösningar.
* Genomföra UX-research, användartester och iterera baserat på feedback.
* Skapa klickbara prototyper för att testa och validera designkoncept.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om UX-trender och bästa praxis.
* Hantera flera designprojekt samtidigt och säkerställa leverans i tid.
* Arbeta både självständigt och i team, med förmåga att ta ägarskap över uppgifter.

### **Kvalifikationer**

* 3+ års erfarenhet av produktdesign för SaaS (App-erfarenhet krävs).
* Gedigna Figma-kunskaper, inklusive skapande av komponenter, design tokens och variabler.
* Erfarenhet av att skapa klickbara prototyper för testning och validering.
* Djup förståelse för UX-principer och förmåga att driva användarcentrerade designbeslut.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i och bidra till ett designsystem.
* Stark projektledningsförmåga – prioritera uppgifter, hantera tidslinjer och driva projekt i mål.
* En lagspelare som trivs i samarbete men också kan arbeta självständigt

### **Ett plus**

* Erfarenhet av EdTech eller design för lärplattformar.

### **Krav när du ansöker**

* Ditt CV.
* Din portfölj som visar en historik av designade produkter, med betoning på dina direkta bidrag. Om din portfölj är lösenordsskyddad, vänligen ge oss informationen i ansökan.
* Flytande i svenska och engelska.

### **Vi erbjuder**

**Att göra en riktig skillnad**


Möjlighet att vara en del av vårt team och bygga en plattform som förändrar och formar skolans framtid. Vi hjälper lärare spendera mer tid med sina elever.

**Ett energiskt startup-företag med en passion för iterativ utveckling**


Ord är inte nog för oss, vi handlar! Från att leverera funktioner till att spendera tid i skolor som använder vårt system har vi utvecklat nära relationer med våra användare. Vi arbetar tillsammans med dem för att bygga den bästa produkten för lärare, administratörer, studerande och vårdnadshavare.

**Ett grymt team**


Eftersom vi är ett litet team på ca. 30 personer lär vi oss och växer varje dag. Vi tror att tillsammans kan vi flytta berg och letar alltid efter sätt att utvecklas.

### **Om Meitner**


Meitner är en ny och modern skolplattform designad för förskola, grundskola och gymnasium. Genom att bygga alla verktyg som en skola behöver på ett ställe - siktar vi på att förenkla och stärka pedagogernas dagliga arbete och kunna tillbringa mer tid med elever än administration.

title: Product Designer (UX/UI)
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
 Create intuitive and user-centered design solutions.
   

  

 Develop and maintain design principles and guidelines for the team.
   

  

 Collaborate with developers and stakeholders to iterate and improve products.
   

  

**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* At least 5 years of experience as a product designer, UI/UX designer, or similar role.
* End-User Experience: Minimum 3 years of experience working with end-user products and services.
* Tools: Experience with design tools such as Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.
* A strong portfolio showing an understanding of user-centered design.
* Experience with wireframing, prototyping, and user testing.
* Knowledge of design principles for both mobile and web.
* Additional: Strong communication skills and the ability to justify design decisions with data and insights.


**Application deadline:** 
 09-03-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Product Designer (UX/UI)
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
* Be a productive member of the team.


**Requirements**
* At least 5 years of experience as a Product Designer or UI/UX Designer.
* Minimum 3 years of experience working directly with end-user products and services.
* Create intuitive, user-centered design solutions that enhance user experience.
* Develop and maintain design principles and guidelines to ensure consistency across the team.
* Collaborate closely with developers and stakeholders to iterate on and improve products.
* Proficient in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD for designing and prototyping.


**Benefits**
* A challenging, innovating environment.
* Opportunities for learning where needed.

title: Service Designer - User Experience on Digital Platforms, B2B
description:
Our solutions are a key part of most industries - automotive, electronics, medical research, renewable energy, food production, infrastructure and many more. Working with us means working with the latest technologies and groundbreaking, sustainable innovations.
   

  

**Join Atlas Copco as a Service Designer** 
 and enhance our customer experience across all channels. Collaborate with global teams to analyze user behavior, identify pain points, and develop data-informed solutions that improve customer satisfaction and drive digital sales on our website.
   

  

**Your Role**
 As a Service Designer at Atlas Copco, you collaborate with UX designers, product owners, marketing, and global customer centers to analyze user behavior, identify pain points and design user-centered solutions. Together with your colleagues in the team, you shape our omni-channel customer experience. Your work boost customer satisfaction, drive digital sales, and increase efficiency for both our customers and internal users.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Conduct qualitative and quantitative user research
* Translate research into actionable recommendations
* Map and analyze customer journeys
* Develop customer personas
* Collaborate on data-driven design solutions
* Identify and propose service design improvements
* Ensure content and support align with customer needs
* Advocate for user-centered design
* Unify user journeys across digital platforms


 You report to Kevin Su, Program Manager Customer Experience within Atlas Copco Industrial Technique.
   

  

**You Will Need**
* Minimum 3 years’ experience in service design, UX research, or related field
* Experience with qualitative and quantitative research
* Proficiency in Figma
* Proficiency in Miro or other similar online collaboration tools.
* Strong skills in Excel, Google Analytics, Looker Studio, Microsoft Clarity, Hotjar, and AI tools.
* Interest and skills within communication and analysis
* Experience in facilitating workshops with cross functional stakeholders


**Good To Have**
* Experience in industrial environments, B2B
* Experience in Adobe Experience Manager


**We Offer**
* A dynamic and collaborative work environment
* Opportunities for professional growth and development
* Possibility to work in innovative projects with a real impact
* A supportive team culture with work-life balance
* Competitive salary and benefits


**City:** 
 Nacka, Stockholm.
   

  

 We are looking forward to your application via our job site!
   

  

**Diverse by nature and inclusive by choice**
 Bright ideas come from all of us. The more unique perspectives we embrace, the more innovative we are. Together we build a culture where difference is valued and we share a deep sense of purpose and belonging.

title: Designer
description:
Together with our partner Realy Bostad, we are now seeking a talented and driven Designer to join us in a full-time position. This is a full-time role where you will dedicate 50% of your time to projects for our partner Realy Bostad and 50% to Essen projects and initiatives.
 



  





 This unique role combines creative execution with practical project management. The ideal candidate will thrive in a fast-paced environment, taking full ownership of key responsibilities while maintaining a professional approach.
 



  





**What you will do** 




 In this role, you’ll contribute to a variety of design, content, and marketing projects, including but not limited to:
 



  





 1. Design execution:
 


* Create and program Word and PowerPoint templates for presentations and reports.
* Manage financial communication materials, such as investor presentations and reports.
* Develop visually compelling social media content for Instagram and LinkedIn.



  





 2. Social media management:
 


* Take full ownership of Instagram, including creating and implementing content strategies, producing posts, and ensuring alignment with the brand’s tone and goals.
* Support the Management Team on LinkedIn by designing and improving content for professional and investor-related communication.



  





 3. Content & marketing management:
 


* Update and manage content on website CMS platforms.
* Design and execute email marketing campaigns using Mailchimp.
* Collaborate on PR and marketing plans, ensuring all communication materials are well-structured and delivered on time.



  





 4. Photography & video:
 


* Handle basic photography and video editing, including drone footage and project documentation.
* Create visuals for events, such as property showcases.



  





 5. Project & event support:
 


* Assist in event planning and coordination, ensuring schedules, logistics, and materials are well-organized.
* Manage marketing-related administrative tasks, including monthly communication plans and project timelines.



 6. Collaboration:
 


* Work closely with internal and external stakeholders to ensure timely delivery of all creative and operational outputs.



  





**About you** 




 You’re not just a designer – you’re a doer. You thrive on seeing projects come to life and take pride in creating polished, high-quality outputs. You’re comfortable taking full ownership of Instagram strategies and supporting professional communication on LinkedIn. Your ability to balance creative tasks with operational responsibilities makes you an essential part of the team.
 



  





*What we expect from you* 



* A minimum of two years’ experience in a similar role/ professional design.
* Proven competencies within design disciplines.
* Expert-level skills in typical design software (Adobe Creative Suite and Figma).
* Ability to present in a structured and confident way to internal and external audiences.
* Proven experience in financial communication, with a strong understanding of producing professional and investor-focused materials.
* Expertise in Microsoft Office, especially Word and PowerPoint.
* Proficiency with tools like Mailchimp, Notion and Right.
* Strong ability to plan, prioritize, and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Basic knowledge of photography and video editing tools is a plus.
* Fluency in Swedish (written and spoken); good proficiency in English.
* A structured and detail-oriented approach with a creative eye.



  





**About Essen** 




 At Essen we develop and manage brands for ambitious owners and teams. We meet each business-critical situation with a tailored solution. Processes, teams, competencies – everything is bespoke. But while our approach is flexible, we remain constant. Loyal, helpful and unwaveringly accountable for every aspect of your brand.
 



 Read more: 
 **https://esseninternational.com/** 




  





**About Realy Bostad** 




 We are a Swedish landlord with a strong belief in rental housing and its potential to be improved. That’s why we are building new homes with a focus on quality, sustainability, customer service, and digitalization.
 



 Read more: 
 **https://realybostad.se/** 




  





**Our collaboration** 




 Together, Essen and Realy Bostad are redefining the intersection of design and real estate. This partnership provides a unique opportunity for you to contribute to impactful projects that combine creative branding with meaningful residential development.
 



  





**Apply here:** 




 https://careers.esseninternational.com/jobs/5551441-designer

description:
