title: Inhouse Sales Agent
description:
Scandic Group & Meeting Sverige är Scandics Inhouse Sales avdelning där vi hanterar alla grupp - och mötesaffärer för våra hotell i Sverige.


Vi tar hand om och är med kunden hela vägen från offertförfrågan fram till deras ankomst samt följer upp och hanterar faktureringen efter avresan.


Med hög energi, bra samarbete och en riktig ”nu kör vi” anda arbetar vi för att erbjuda en bekymmersfri kundresa i världsklass och leverera bästa möjliga service till våra gäster.


**Vi behöver nu stärka upp med nya, härliga kollegor till flera av våra team och söker efter engagerade Inhouse Sales Agents som brinner för affären och service!**



Som Inhouse Sales Agent hanterar du hela eller delar av kundresan, från förfrågan och fram till gästens ankomst till hotellet genom att göra en behovsanalys, skicka offert och bekräfta affären samt detaljplanera hela bokningen inklusive fakturering.



Du, ditt team och din Area Inhouse Sales Manager jobbar nära och tillsammans med hotellen runt om i Sverige.


Som Inhouse Sales Agent behöver du vara lyhörd, noggrann och ha en vilja att leverera service på högsta nivå. Du är kreativ, drivs av försäljning, har ett positivt bemötande gentemot kollegor och kunder och har lätt för att samarbeta. Vi vill att du är modig, tar initiativ samt vågar komma med nya förslag och idéer. Att du brinner för goda kundrelationer och att din kommunikativa förmåga är på topp ser vi som en självklarhet.



Du ansvarar för att din prestation medverkar till att teamet når sina mål och att kunderna upplever fantastisk service. Du och ditt team bidrar starkt till att kunderna återvänder till oss på Scandic.



Vi vill att du tar med dig din kultur och erfarenheter för att tillsammans med dina kollegor bidra till att inspirera och utveckla Scandic Group & Meeting.


Att du både pratar och skriver flytande på Svenska och Engelska är ett krav. Tidigare erfarenhet av liknande arbete, Scandic och kunskaper i Opera Cloud är starkt meriterande.


Vi sitter i ljusa lokaler i Solna Business Park och arbetstiden är fördelad mellan 8.00-17.00 på vardagar och helger kan förekomma.


Tjänsten är ett vikariat på ungefär ett år med start så snart som möjligt.


Inom Scandic hotels finns stora möjligheter till vidareutveckling efter avslutat vikariat, antingen hos oss på Scandic Group & Meeting eller på något av våra hotell.


Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kommer tillsättas så snart som möjligt, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt.


Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic Group & Meeting!


  
Det här är en anställning med vikariat på heltid.


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.
company_addresses:
Scandic Hotels Deutschland GmbH
Gabriele-Tergit-Promenade 19
10963 Berlin
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

title: Nattreceptionist Scandic Malmö City
description:
Scandic Malmö City ligger som namnet antyder mycket centralt- vid kanalen med närhet till Gustav Adolfs Torg såväl som Malmös shoppingstråk. Hotellets restaurang är en naturlig mötesplats för våra inresta gäster. Med gäster från världens alla hörn skapar vi dagligen goda relationer med våra gäster. Vår gästnöjdhet är vår prioritet och vi har en mycket stark servicekultur hos oss-en servicekultur som möjliggörs av att vi också har nöjda medarbetare som är stolta över sin arbetsplats och ser möjligheterna att fortsätta utvecklas.


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Malmö City.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på deltid.


Vi söker nu en ansvarstagande och serviceinriktad nattreceptionsist till vårt team. Tjänsten innebär en provanställning på 6 månader, med möjlighet till tillsvidareanställning vid ett gott samarbete och uppfyllda förväntningar.



Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.

title: Software Engineers to Zalando
description:
Are you passionate about working with cutting-edge technologies in a fast-paced, dynamic environment? Zalando, an international e-commerce company, is seeking Software Engineers to join their growing team in Stockholm. We are looking for both junior and more senior candidates to fill these exciting positions!
### **About the company and the role**


We are looking for two Software Engineers to join Zalando, an international e-commerce company that is shaping the future of retail. This company provides a platform that serves millions of customers worldwide and is now expanding its engineering team to continue delivering innovative solutions. Here, you’ll have the chance to work with technologies such as Java, Kotlin, AWS, PostgreSQL, and Elasticsearch, all while collaborating with passionate teams focused on driving innovation.


In the role of Software Engineer, you’ll develop and operate large-scale systems that ensure timely and accurate order fulfillment. Your primary focus will be to build backend applications that handle high volumes of data and deliver seamless experiences for customers and partners.


At Zalando, you’ll be part of a culture that values collaboration, creativity, and continuous learning. This role offers you the chance to contribute to an innovative, customer-centric organization that is reshaping the future of online retail.


**Your responsibilities will include:**


As a Software Engineer at Zalando, you’ll focus on developing and optimizing backend services and applications that support the company’s fulfillment process. You’ll build scalable, low-latency systems and leverage state-of-the-art technologies to deliver solutions that impact millions of customers. The role is available for both junior and senior engineers, depending on experience, in an environment that fosters innovation and collaboration.


* Developing and maintaining high-performance, low-latency systems for data streaming and processing.
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and scale solutions for fulfillment and customer experience.
* Taking ownership of applications, managing them from development through deployment and monitoring.
* Innovating and finding solutions to scale the platform in an increasingly complex ecosystem.
* Actively contributing to the development of new features and improvements.

You’ll contribute to Zalando’s success by ensuring the systems you build directly enhance the customer experience. As a Software Engineer, you’ll be challenged by the complexity of building distributed systems at scale and will have the opportunity to collaborate across teams and countries.


**We believe you have:**


* A relevant degree in Computer Science or a related field.
* Solid experience with Java or Kotlin and building APIs.
* Familiarity with databases (e.g., PostgreSQL) and event-driven architectures.
* Some experience or interest in AWS, Kubernetes, and Elasticsearch.
* A passion for problem-solving and building scalable solutions.
* Strong communication skills in both English and Swedish (written and spoken).

For the senior role, we expect you to have at least five years of professional experience, particularly with high-volume data streaming systems, and an understanding of operating services end-to-end. We also value individuals who are comfortable working in agile environments and collaborating with both technical and business stakeholders.


**It’s a bonus if you have:**


* Experience with cloud technologies (AWS, Kubernetes) and distributed systems.
* Knowledge of Kafka or similar messaging systems.
* Experience working with large-scale, high-availability systems.

We are looking for candidates who are proactive, innovative, and motivated to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.


### **Other information**

  

Location: Stockholm.


Selection process: We apply continuous selection, which means the position may be filled before the application deadline.


If you have any questions about the role or the recruitment process, feel free to contact the responsible recruiter Ronja Bergman on ronja.bergman@techtalents.se


#### **Företag:** **Zalando - Stockholm**


#### **Plats:** **Stockholm**


#### **Sista ansökningsdatum:** **2025-06-30**


#### **Kontaktperson:** **Ronja Bergman**
**ronja.bergman@techtalents.se**

title: Digital Marknadsförare - Content Manager - PRAKTIKPLATS (LIA)
description:
Vi erbjuder en praktikplats

Beroende på dina skills så kan du få uppgifter som tex. att hantera våra aktiviteter online. nyhetsbrev, sociala medier, uppdatering av bilder/banners, produkter, texter på hemsidor, designförslag.**Vi anpassar arbetsuppgifterna efter din kunskap**.

Förekommande arbetsuppgifter:

* Ansvara för vår digitala närvaro i SOME
* SEO-optimering samt Google Adwords
* Skapa nyhetsbrev
* Content hemsida
* Korrekturhantering
* Kundskisser
* Jobba med design i mockups

**För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du:**  
Studerar eller har nyligen studerat till E-Commerce manager / Content manager eller liknande utbildning.

**Personliga egenskaper som vi söker:**  
\* Driven  
\* Noggrann  
\* Engagerad

**Programmiljö**  
\* Adobe creative cloud  
\* Powerpoint  
\* Wix/Shopify  
\* Canva  
\* Publer

**Vi attraherar dig för att:**  
\* Du får möjlighet att utvecklas och få skills i skarpt läge  
\* Du får arbeta på ett centralt beläget kontor med bra kommunikationer, nära Stureplan  
\* Möjlighet med fortsatt anställning

**Våra verksamheter**   
www.thebrandconcept.se  
www.pinsfactory.se

Jobbtyp: Heltid, Deltid

Schema:

* Dag

Ansökningsfrågor:

* Går du, elller har du utbildat dig inom Content management, Online marknadsföring eller liknande?

-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.

title: Testingenjör inom HW till Saab Surveillance med 1-3 års...
description:
Har du arbetat ett par år med mekaniska tester och miljöprövning? Vill du arbeta i en tekniskt utmanande och utvecklande miljö? Saab Surveillance i Huskvarna söker nu en testingenjör som vill vara med och bygga testutrustning för produktion.

### **Att jobba som testingenjör hos Saab**


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag som utvecklar högteknologiska lösningar för en säkrare värld. Inom Saab Surveillance får du arbeta i en högteknologisk miljö där din kompetens värderas högt. Just nu står verksamheten inför en spännande fas med industrialisering, vilket innebär ett växande behov av testutrustning med mekanisk inriktning.


Som Testingenjör hos Saab kommer du att samarbeta med produktion, konstruktörer och produktionstekniker för att utveckla och implementera testutrustning. Ditt arbete kommer att ha stort fokus på hårdvarutester och miljöprövning, där du säkerställer att produkterna uppfyller krav på hållbarhet och prestanda.


Du kommer att ingå i ett team på 10 personer, som arbetar tätt tillsammans men i projekt med totalt cirka 60 medarbetare.


Placering: Huskvarna.

### **Att vara konsult på Nexer Tech Talent**


Som senior konsult hos Nexer Tech Talent blir du en del av ett nätverk av erfarna specialister. Du kommer att vara anställd av Nexer Tech Talent och arbeta som konsult hos Saab med start enligt överenskommelse. Du får även ta del av ett skräddarsytt utbildningsprogram där du utvecklar din tekniska kompetens inom områden som AI, Cloud och cybersäkerhet, samt ledarskap och personlig utveckling.


Vi stöttar och utmanar dig genom hela uppdraget och erbjuder möjligheter att delta i nätverksträffar, inspirerande föreläsningar och sociala aktiviteter. Som konsult hos oss finns även möjlighet att bidra som mentor och dela med dig av din kunskap till mer juniora kollegor.

### **Vi söker dig som:**

* Har en ingenjörsutbildning inom maskinteknik eller mekatronik.
* Har minst 1–3 års erfarenhet av mekaniska tester och miljöprövning.
* Har erfarenhet av att genomföra vibrations-, temperatur-, elmiljö- och blixtprov.
* Är van vid att bryta ner krav kopplade till miljötålighet och definiera testprocedurer.
* Är en strukturerad och analytisk problemlösare med god kommunikationsförmåga.

### **Ansökan**


Låter detta som en spännande möjlighet? Vi rekryterar löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Om du har frågor, kontakta Tech Recruiter Olivia Holm på olivia.holm@nexergroup.com.


Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

### **Om Nexer Tech Talent**


Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Med över 2 500 medarbetare i 15 länder och mer än 35 års erfarenhet hjälper vi våra kunder att ligga steget före strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer Tech Talent här.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
Join our multicultural, agile team at Indivd and work alongside top experts from around the world. We offer a flexible work environment, allowing you to choose between working remotely, in an office, or a mix of both. Apart from scheduled meetings, you have the freedom to set your own work schedule.

### **Who We Are**


At **Indivd**, we are revolutionizing **computer vision** and **AI-powered insights** in the physical world—without compromising privacy. Our patented AI-driven platform helps store owners, shopping malls, and other businesses gain **unprecedented visibility into customer behavior**. Using advanced deep learning models, we provide high-accuracy insights to help businesses thrive.

### **What You’ll Do**


As a **Machine Learning Engineer**, you’ll play a crucial role in designing and optimizing state-of-the-art **deep learning models** for **computer vision**. You will be responsible for improving **model performance**, optimizing **GPU-based cloud deployment**, and collaborating with end-users to develop meaningful insights.

### **Key Responsibilities**


Develop and optimize **deep learning models** for **computer vision** applications  

Improve **cloud-based GPU deployments** for efficiency and scalability  

Work closely with **data engineers** and **end-users** to design and implement insights  

Maintain and refine **high-performance ML pipelines**  

Research and integrate **cutting-edge techniques** to push the boundaries of accuracy and performance

### **What We’re Looking For**

#### **Must-Have Skills**


**Object detection**  

**Object tracking**  

**Image retrieval**  

**Algorithms & data structures**  

**Python**  

**PyTorch**  

**CUDA and TensorRT**  

**C++**  

**Online video analytics**  

**Docker**

#### **Nice to Have (Bonus Skills)**


**MongoDB**  

**Message brokers**

### **Why Join Us?**


Competitive salary  

Freedom to work **remotely** or from the office  

Work with some of the world’s leading **AI experts, entrepreneurs, and investors**  

Opportunities for **skill development** through training and seminars  

**Generous stock options** program for key employees


**Ready to push the boundaries of AI-driven computer vision?** **Apply today!**

title: OSS_BSS Senior Architect
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


Business Area Cloud Software & Services (BCSS) is created to capitalize on the opportunity of the convergence of cloud and services. As our customers deploy 5G and programable networks, our aim is to accelerate the optimization and automation of increasingly complex networks, by redefining to cloud and AI native software and services.

  

Solution Area Business & Operations Support Systems (SA BOS) is built to provide a leading portfolio with an outstanding customer experience by aligning architecture, products, services, roadmaps, and commercial structure.

  

SA BOS Technology Evolution is built to develop and maintain the product and solution direction architecture, secure alignment with respect to main standardization bodies and  

drive the overall Technology Strategy and Technology Leadership within the Solution Area BOS portfolio.

  

We are looking for a person that really likes to work with other people in technology and architecture with the aim to guide our evolution in the best possible direction for medium- and long-term business success. As the cross-portfolio technology and architecture responsible unit in solution area BSS and OSS, we are scouting new technologies, and business needs to understand the best value and adoption in our product and services portfolio.

  

You will join our architecture authority unit within the Technology Evolution team in BCSS SA BOS(OSS/BSS) consisting of approximately 40 persons in two units. We are strategically co-located with our key centers (head quarter, R&D and Services) in Kista, Karlskrona, Athlone, Budapest, São Paulo, Toronto, Ottawa, Chennai and Gurgaon.

 **What you will do:**


To guide and direct our product/solution and services portfolio to a competitive technology and architecture evolution.  

* understanding technology trends and standards and connect them with the evolution/requirements of our products and solutions
* Understand our products and domains and their business
* Work to distinguishing the Ericsson portfolio from the competitors
  

Develop and anchor the BOS portfolio product and services portfolio evolution from a technology and architecture perspective  

* Drive and/or participate in technology and architecture studies
* Drive or participate in proof of concepts
* Understand and contribute to relevant global standards (TMF, 3GPP, CAMARA, GSMA)
* Support cross Solution Area standardization and integration initiatives and global programs impacting SA BOS.
* Cooperation and collaboration with Architecture and Strategy teams within and outside SA BOS
* Collaborate with Portfolio to prioritize the road map in regard to technology and architecture
 **The skills you bring:**

* BSc in Engineering/Computer Science or similar, MBA as plus.
* Technology and business savvy (technology and trends are shifting rapidly and you need to enjoy taking on new areas and connect to value)
* Extensive R&D experience, (process and LCM to design once, sell many?)
* Strong technical domain knowledge in NW Service Orchestration and Assurance, and/or radio network management, and/or core NW management, and/or business support (core Commerce, Charging and Billing)
**Other Qualifications:**
-------------------------


* Proven leader for technical teams and customer engagements
* Positive attitude
* drives change through continuous improvements
* Proven ability to communicate and influence (skilled in creating, documenting, and presenting technology and value argumentation)
* Human skills and safety to understand and respectfully have persons from all hierarchies in your personal network
* An established personal NW within R&D of one or several of the requested technical domains in Ericsson
* An established personal NW within product management and/or sales of one or several of the requested technical domains in Ericsson
* An established personal NW in customer units/regions for one or several of the requested technical domains in Ericsson
* A combined experience of SW development, Architecture, product management and leadership
* Hands-on experience from competition

 **Location:** Sweden (Kista, Karlskrona), Athlone, Budapest, São Paulo, Toronto, Ottawa, Chennai and Gurgaon.

**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Karlskrona

**Req ID:** 762523

title: Product Manager - Emerging Technologies
description:
**Job Description**
**WHAT YOU’LL DO**
 As a Product Manager within our Emerging Technologies function, you will play a pivotal role in driving the development and implementation of new technologies, from inception and ideation to global roll out. You will lead cross-functional teams, including Technical Engineers, Software Engineers, Data and ML Engineers, and Business Experts, to deliver high-impact products. In this role, you will prioritize features and initiatives, balancing customer value with technical feasibility. You will collaborate with other Product Managers to ensure product coherence and value creation timelines. You will act as the primary point of contact between business stakeholders, technical teams, and leadership to drive product development forward for your product.
   

  

* Collaborate with product managers and stakeholders to define the strategic direction for product development, aligning it with business goals and customer needs.
* Follow agile methodologies and best practices to facilitate efficient and iterative product development.
* Lead a product team consisting of DE/DS/ML Engineers, Technical/Software engineers, and Business Experts.
* Work closely with cross-functional areas such as AI functions, Tech functions, and Business functions to set requirements, prioritize features, and ensure timely delivery.
* Define goals/KPIs/OKRs and align them with the respective Product/Engineering Managers, to deliver synchronized value across product area.
* Track and manage risks and issues
* Drive and contribute to product/solution design


**Who You’ll Work With**
 You’ll be a part of a global team to architect, implement and support product and systems by leveraging emerging technologies to change status quo and achieve radical novelty and fast growth. The team co-drives new platform adoption, maintaining matrices to measure success of features and capabilities of the platform. The team collaborates with other Product Managers to ensure product coherence and value creation timelines and acts as the primary point of contact between business stakeholders, technical teams, and leadership to drive product development forward for emerging tech.
   

  

**Who You Are**
*We are looking for people with*
* Experience as a Product manager, Project Manager, Scrum master, or similar roles in a technology environment
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders
* Functional knowledge of lean-agile development and methodologies as well as product vision creation and product roadmap development
* Ability to build end-to-end product strategy, including definition of scope, roadmap, and KPIs, and understand product development from ideation to release


*And people who are*
* Capable of gathering, analysing, and understanding customer and business needs and understanding impact against product backlog and impact on team
* Able to clearly express the connections between larger business goals and small backlog items for team members
* Experienced from Retail industry and specifically supply chain management is a plus
* Experienced in working in complex enterprise systems
* Have a general understanding system integration, system configuration in enterprise systems, development processes, test, and deployment.


 We are open to hiring candidates at our HO in Stockholm or at our regional hub in Bengaluru. Interested candidates should apply before
 **14th of March 2025** 
 .
   

  

**Who We Are**
 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  

 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  

* We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
* All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories and ARKET.
* In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.


**JOIN US**
 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.
   

  

* We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.

title: Chief Technology Officer (CTO)
description:
**🎯 Looking for ideal candidates** 
 [Your application means your "Expression of Interest"]
 



  





 Alveo AB is currently looking for a Chief Technology Officer (CTO) & Co-Founder to lead the technical development of our technology. This role involves hands-on engineering, prototyping, system integration, and scaling the technology from smaller-scale prototype development and testing, to full-scale deployment (in several progressive steps with increasing complexity). The CTO/co-founder will work closely with the CEO/founder and be responsible for assembling a world-class technical team.
 



  





**🚀 Background & Experience** 




  





**Education:** 



* PhD or MSc in Robotics, Computer Science, Mechatronics,
 
 Aerospace,
 
 or a closely related field. A candidate with mixed knowledge and experience in more than one subject (mentioned above) is ideal.
* Alternatively, a highly skilled industry professional with strong hands-on UAS development experience (even without a PhD).



  





**Industry Experience:** 



* Experience in UAV design, autonomous flight systems, or embedded software development.
* Preferably experience in
 **R&D-heavy startups, aerospace companies, or robotics labs** 
 .
* Experience working on
 **prototype-to-production transitions** 
 (not just research).



  





**Project Exposure:** 



* Preferably has worked on
 **full development cycles** 
 —from early-stage prototyping to scaling hardware products.
* Hands-on experience
 **building, testing, and debugging UAV prototypes** 
 is essential.



  





**🛠️ Core Technical Expertise (Must-Haves)** 




  





**UAV Flight Control & Autonomous Systems:** 



* Strong understanding of
 **aerodynamics, flight mechanics, and control theory** 
 .
* Experience with
 **PX4, ArduPilot, or custom flight control firmware** 
 .
* Ability to develop
 **custom UAV autonomy solutions** 
 (e.g., waypoint navigation, multi-drone coordination).



  





**Software & Embedded Systems Development** 



* Proficient in
 **C++, Python, and ROS** 
 for UAV control and automation.
* Experience with
 **real-time computing, sensor fusion, and communication protocols** 
 .
* Strong debugging skills, especially for
 **hardware-software integration** 
 .



  





**UAV Prototyping & System Integration** 



* Experience building
 **custom UAVs from scratch** 
 , including assembling, tuning, and troubleshooting.
* Hands-on experience with
 **IMUs, GPS, LiDAR, cameras, and RF communication** 
 .
* Familiarity with
 **PCB design, embedded hardware, and actuator selection** 
 .



  





**💡 Bonus Skills (Nice-to-Haves)** 




  




* Experience with
 **swarm robotics or multi-UAV coordination** 
 .
* **CAD software skills** 
 (SolidWorks, Fusion 360) for UAV design.
* Knowledge of
 **machine learning applications in UAV flight optimization** 
 .



  





**👨‍💼 Leadership & Growth Potential** 




  




* **Hands-on & problem-solving mindset** 
 —comfortable debugging prototypes and iterating fast.
* Ability to collaborate with MSc/PhD students, external consultants, and suppliers.
* Willing to
 **grow into a leadership role** 
 over time, even if not starting as a seasoned executive.



  





**📌 Preferred Personality & Working Style** 




  




* **Practical & hands-on** 
 —enjoys solving real-world technical challenges.
* **Innovative thinker** 
 —can navigate technical unknowns and develop creative solutions.
* **Resilient & adaptable** 
 —willing to iterate and troubleshoot through development roadblocks.
* **Engaged** 
 —proactively giving (and seeking) constructive feedback and taking part in improving the company and the team.



  





 This was mostly related to the technical side of the profile we are looking for. Another critical aspect is your soft skills, interest in what you do best, and your personality fit with the team. Please take note that your application is deemed as your "expression of interest" rather than an official job application. More details about Alveo's technology and plans forward will be shared with the selected candidates during later discussions. Only selected candidates will be contacted. The position will be open until a suitable candidate is chosen.
 



  





 We, at Alveo, strongly believe in collaboration, critical thinking, intense focus and attention to one challenge at a time, steady/consistent growth through the power of habits, attention to balancing the workload, and including mindfulness principles in our daily work. We strive to create an equal environment for all to learn, grow and enjoy.

title: Service Desk Analyst- AV Devices
description:
**Position:** 
 Service Desk Analyst - AV & Conference Room Services
 



**Location:** 
 Sodertalje, Sweden
 



  





**About Wipro** 




  





 Wipro is a leading global information technology, consulting and business process services company. We harness the power of cognitive computing, hyper-automation, robotics, cloud, analytics and emerging technologies to help our clients adapt to the digital world and make them successful. A company recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, strong commitment to sustainability and good corporate citizenship, we have over 220,000 dedicated employees serving clients across six continents. Together, we discover ideas and connect the dots to build a better and a bold new future.
 



  





**Responsibilities & Requirements** 




  




* Conference room AV devices experience
* Team should provide support for specific tasks that fall outside of the PS0079 scope but included in FSR. Few examples are listed below
* Assistance with mounting and demounting conference room equipment · Small IT equipment installations
* Onsite support requests from the CDA and SD teams that are beyond the scope of PS0079
* Schedule a weekly check-in with all stakeholders to discuss the status of work completion, as well as gather feedback for potential areas of improvement and to ensure everyone is aware of project progress
* Coordinate closely with Business owners and stakeholders including vendor throughout the Conference room upgrade process. This includes preparing quotation drafts, which we will then submit to the Business owners for review and verification
* Following the PO generation, team to coordinate and work with the PMO team to finalize the invoicing process. Ensure that all relevant stakeholders are informed of the status and any necessary steps to be taken
* Schedule a weekly check-in with all stakeholders to discuss the status of work completion, as well as gather feedback for potential areas of improvement and to ensure everyone is aware of project progress
* The number of conferences visited per day and the updated firmware status
* Inventory report – A list of all in-scope and outside of scope equipment in all the conference room
* Conf Room Report - Address, location, conference room name & BU owner & all their respective equipment report
* A list of conference rooms and their corresponding locations, including addresses
* Inbound and outbound report for reuse display screens
* MTR quotation, PO and invoice report
* Spare part quotation and invoice report · Schedule a weekly check-in with all stakeholders to discuss the status of work completion, as well as gather feedback for potential areas of improvement and to ensure everyone is aware of project progress.



  





**Diversity and Inclusion at Wipro** 




  





 We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, marital status, age, ethnic and national origin, sexual and political orientation and disability status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: Regional Account Manager
description:
**Discover Trend**
 Trend Micro, a global cybersecurity leader, helps make the world safe for exchanging digital information. Fueled by decades of security expertise, global threat research, and continuous innovation, Trend Micro's cybersecurity platform protects hundreds of thousands of organizations and millions of individuals across clouds, networks, devices, and endpoints. As a leader in cloud and enterprise cybersecurity, the platform delivers a powerful range of advanced threat defense techniques optimized for environments like AWS, Microsoft, and Google, and central visibility for better, faster detection and response. With 7,000 employees across 65 countries, Trend Micro enables organizations to simplify and secure their connected world. For additional information, visit www.trendmicro.com
   

  

**Discover You**
 At Trend, we are always looking for top talent. We hire capability 1st, and you will work with the best. When you join us, you have direct access to any level, and freedom to make an impact and influence. With Trend Micro, you drive your own development. You are recognised for your passion to succeed, and can be the best part of yourself here.
   

  

 Discover your next exciting career opportunity….
   

  

**Regional Account Manager, Public Sector**
**Location: Sweden**
 Trend Micro, a global cybersecurity leader, helps make the world safe for exchanging digital information. Fueled by decades of security expertise, global threat research, and continuous innovation, our unified cybersecurity platform protects over 500,000 organizations and millions of individuals across clouds, networks, devices, and endpoints.
   

  

 Trend Vision One™ delivers advanced threat defense techniques, extended detection and response (XDR), and integration across the IT ecosystem, including AWS, Microsoft, and Google, enabling organizations to better understand, communicate, and mitigate cyber risk.
   

  

 Our Trend global threat research team delivers unparalleled intelligence and insights that power our cybersecurity platform and help protect organizations around the world from 100s of millions of threats daily.
   

  

 We have 7,000 employees across 65 countries, singularly focused on security and passionate about making the world a safer and better place.
   

  

 Trend enables organizations to simplify and secure their connected world.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Sell Trend Micro's products and services using a strategic sales approach, developing strong relationships with key individuals within named and prospect accounts.
* Drive quarterly business reviews with selected customers to ensure value from Trend Micro investment and ensure customers are kept up to date with Trend Micro product roadmaps, enabling customers to plan and mitigate risks to their business.
* Develop strategies and orchestrate company resources to maximize sales volume within assigned and prospect accounts.
* Effectively engage and build cooperative internal relationships with sales resources: SE, Channel, Specialist sales team and Leadership as required.
* Develop and maintain a robust sales pipeline and ensure full compliance with all internal processes.
* Provide accurate forecasts and reports on activity and sales performance.


**Experience**
* A proven track record of success selling in the Public Sector, (preferably in Cyber Security or related field), developing strategic customer relationships and winning new business.
* High levels of achievement against quota and experience selling to Senior IT and C-Suite personas.
* Experience selling SaaS products and services with an understanding of platform solutions.
* Can demonstrate strong sales skills and high level of technical and business acumen in both our industry and industry being sold into.
* Able to manage complex sales processes, selling complex solutions to medium and large enterprise customers.
* Experienced in a competitive field sales role selling direct to customers.
* Strong knowledge of and experience working within the channel and developing partner relationships.


**You Have**
* Minimum 4 years’ experience in an Enterprise Sales role.
* Ability to engage at the C level in a business benefits discussion.
* Previous experience or exposure selling Enterprise Security Solutions.
* Previous experience in selling IT security/ Infrastructure/ Software would be an advantage.
* Proven ability to achieve sales quotas in target market by selling and closing complex solution to end customers.
* Dynamic, results-oriented with a passion for over-achieving sales targets!
* Excellent interpersonal, negotiation and closing skills.
* Can-do attitude! We are looking for candidates passionate about their work and the cyber industry just as much as the experience you bring – a strong team and work ethic are paramount for success!
* Strong presentation & communication skills. English language skills are a must.


**Why Trend Micro?**
 Trend Micro provides equal employment opportunity for all applicants and employees. Trend Micro does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy and childbirth or related medical conditions, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, family care leave status, veteran status, marital status, sexual orientation, or gender identity.
   

  

 Trend Micro is a progressive employer with a very special and unique culture. Here at Trend Micro you will work with the best. When you join us, you have direct access to any level, and freedom to make an impact and influence. We expect leadership, not management. With Trend Micro, you drive your own development. We encourage thought leadership and advocate internal opportunity. Trend is like nowhere else. We embrace all of our differences and are motivated by challenge. We’re not just all about the money. You are recognised for your passion to succeed, and can be the best part of yourself here.
   

  

 www.trendmicro.com
   

  

 At Trend Micro, we embrace change, empower people, and encourage innovation in a connected world. Our diversity and multicultural workforce are key contributing factors to our success across the globe. We like to have fun while taking our culture seriously. We are an equal opportunity employer and are committed to this regardless of race, colour, religion, sex, nationality, age, citizenship, sexual orientation, marital status, gender identity or veteran status. We do not allow discrimination or harassment of any kind.

title: Technical Account Manager (Sweden)
description:
**Description**
 At Amazon, our vision is to be earth’s most customer-centric company. In 2006, we launched Amazon Web Services, giving customers access to the same cloud technology we built to serve millions of shoppers on Amazon.com. Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a secure cloud services platform, offering computing power, database storage, content delivery, and other functionality to help businesses scale and grow. Millions of businesses are using AWS cloud solutions to build sophisticated applications with increased flexibility, scalability and reliability.
   

  

**About AWS**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 The Role
   

  

 An AWS Technical Account Manager is a trusted advisor and cloud operations architect for our Enterprise Support customers. As a trusted advisor you’ll have a direct impact in helping our customers gain the most value from cloud technology. You’ll craft and execute strategies to drive our customers’ adoption and use of AWS services. This includes a range of products including EC2, S3, DynamoDB & RDS databases, Lambda, CloudFront CDN, IoT and many more.
   

  

 Our Technical Account Managers partner with some of the most iconic businesses in the country. These range from rising startups building their business from scratch through to large enterprises going through significant transformation. You’ll provide advice on architecture, support strategy, project and launch planning as well as ongoing operational issues.
   

  

**See What The Team Say About Their Roles**
 https://emea-resources.awscloud.com/write-your-own-story/meet-liga-sr-technical-account-manager
   

  

 https://emea-resources.awscloud.com/write-your-own-story/meet-balint-senior-technical-account-manager
   

  

 https://emea-resources.awscloud.com/write-your-own-story/meet-shlomo-senior-technical-account-manager
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* You’ll advise on solutions, provide technical guidance and advocate for the customer
* Ensure AWS environments remain operationally healthy whilst reducing cost and complexity
* Develop trusting relationships with customers, understanding their business needs and technical challenges
* Using your technical acumen and customer obsession, you’ll drive technical discussions regarding incidents, trade-offs, and risk management
* Consult with a range of partners from developers through to C-suite executives
* Collaborate with AWS Solutions Architects, Business Developers, Professional Services Consultants, and Sales Account Managers
* With a bias for action, you'll proactively find opportunities for customers to gain additional value from AWS
* Provide detailed reviews of service events, monthly & quarterly metrics, detailed pre-launch planning
* Solve a variety of problems across different customers as they migrate their workloads to the cloud
* Uplift customer capabilities by running workshops, brown bag sessions, etc.


 A day in the life
   

  

 “AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.”
   

  

**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship and Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience in a similar role as a Technical Account Manager, Consultant, Solutions Architect, Platform Engineer, Systems Engineer, Cloud Architect etc.
* Understand operational parameters and troubleshooting for a combination of the following: Compute, Storage, Networking, CDN, Databases, DevOps, Big Data and Analytics, Security, Applications Development
* Internal enterprise or external customer-facing experience with the ability to clearly articulate to small and large audiences
* Ability to juggle tasks and projects in a fast-paced environment
* Customer obsessed


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Professional experience with cloud offerings such as AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform etc.
* Programming or scripting skills with a combination of Java, Python Perl, Ruby, C#, and/or PHP a plus but not a requirement
* Previous experience as a Software Engineer, Developer, DevOps Engineer etc.
* Understanding of DevOps practices and tools including Continuous Integration / Deployment, Puppet, Docker, Kubernetes, Chef is a plus


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2854031
